duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive history, physical and psychosocial health assessments of patients.
Request appropriate tests and evaluations, differentiating between normal and abnormal findings.
Record and maintain complete and organized patient progress notes and plans for future care.
Develop health care plans with patients and families and utilize available resources.
Coordinate with interdisciplinary team to determine, evaluate, and alter health goals.
Responsible for screening and management of chronic conditions within scope of practice.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (Master's in Nursing preferred)
Valid New York State license and current registration to practice as a Registered Professional Nurse.
Current certificate as a Nurse Practitioner issued by the New York State Department of Education.
Current certification issued by the State Education Department to prescribe medication.
